info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:25PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Idaho and west central Ravalli Counties through 300 PM MDT/200 PM PDT/... At 224 PM MDT/124 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles southwest of Conner, or 36 miles southwest of Hamilton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Idaho and west central Ravalli Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
